reviews.review: Great sequel to portal
I LOVE THIS GAME I LOVE ALL THE PORTAL GAMES I HOPE THERE IS GOING TO BE PORTAL 3 ALSO STILL WANTING HALF LIFE 3 TOO

Clever, interesting, and often funny, Portal 2 is a game that not only lives up to the original, but also exceeds it. It has amusing characters and jokes, good puzzles, and is fun to both play and look at. It is, at times, a little more challenging than Portal, but enjoyably so; people with and without experience should be able to enjoy it. It doesn't require long sittings of gameplay, so if you're a busy person or just can't commit yourself to being on the computer for hours at a time, Portal 2 works. At the same time, it's a game you [i]can[/i] play for hours at a time, if you so choose.

I would especially recommend it to those not fond of direct combat games.

Nach wie vor ungeschlagener Humor, im Vergleich zum ersten Teil sehr aufgemotzte Optik und mal wieder super Rätsel. Durch die Community-Karten ein endloser Spaß!

Un jeu vraiment exceptionnel à découvrir absolument!!
- Des égnigmes passionnantes que ce soit en solo ou dans les missions coop. 
- Une ambiance glacial et psychotique dans un monde ou la technologie des portals vous ouvrirons les portes de votre esprit.
- Environement sonore et musique parfaitement en adéquation avec l'atmosphère du jeu. 
- Vous pourrez recommencé vos épreuves et essayer de réussir les défis qui y seront proposé pour toujours plus de casse-tête.
- Sénario riche et interessant qui vous motivera à en découvrir toujours plus.
- Des personnages attachant.
- Une jouabilité parfaite!
- Un mode Coop doté de nombreuse épreuves spécialement étudié pour etre résolu qu'a 2 joueur, chaqu'un devra y mettre du sien^^
Enfin bref, je ne peut pas tout vous dire mais il est claire que ce jeu a une âme et qu'il restera gravé dans les mémoires. En un mot: EXCELLENT!!

Play Portal first in order to understand Portal 2.
So if you're unsure if you want to but the game, buy the game anyway,
you won't regret it.

What can I say, everything Portal 1 was, just bigger and better.  Rarely does a sequal take everything great about a predecessor and imporve upon it and just blow it out of he water.  It is refreshing to see this, considering how many shit sequals are out there.  

Nothing much has changed in terms of gameplay, except for the addition of the new blue, orange, and white goo.  This allows for more complex puzzles, making gameplay more fun.  Unlike Portal 1, the story is great (Portal 1 ddidn't really have much of a story) and the ending is great.  

The community created content adds a ton of life this game and the co-op is a blast.  The Metascore is not bullshit for once, this game actually deserves its 9.5/10.  My only complaint of this game, and this is a strange complaint, but the story is just a bit too long.  I got a little tired of it towards the end.  

All-in-all, I give tis game a 9.5/10; good story, gameplay, and community content, but I get a little tired of the game towards the end.

Sehr interessantes Spiel! Manche Level erfordern viel Geduld und Überblick, aber es ist den Aufwand jedes Mal wert, da die Story kurzweilig und außerordentlich amüsant ist. Ich habe den Multiplayer angetestet und muss sagen, dass er auch seinen Reiz hat, da die Level nur mit Teamarbeit gelöst werden können, was alles nochmal etwas kniffeliger macht. Das Spiel lebt allerdings hauptsächlich von der Story weshalb der Singleplayer den wichtigeren Teil des Spiels darstellt. Alles in allem ein sehr atmospährisches und unterhaltsames Spiel, das sich auf jeden Fall zu spielen lohnt.

Epic Puzzle game =)
El primero me gustó mucho, pero fue un poco corto. Este es bastante más largo e incluso tiene más variedad en los puzzles. Dos juegos buenísimos, muy entretenidos, originales y divertidos.

Portal 2 is a really good Puzzle game. The characters are fun and intresting, and I really enjoyed playing it. This is a must-have for all who likes problem solving with a bit of humor.

If you're intrested in the story, I'd really recommend playing Portal 1 before you play Portal 2 as the story relates to the happenings in the first game, and it will probably make you feel more immersed in the storyline.

Apart from the two story modes (sp and co-op) there is also a in-game level editor and you can also use Hammer (level editor for source games) to make custom levels to upload to the workshop, and you can play levels for other users (of course).

Portal is THE BEST Puzzle FPS games series that I've played so far. Have fun thinking with portals ;)
A great game.

Éste es uno de mis juegos favoritos. Los chicos de Valve han logrado mezclar 2 géneros tan diferentes como los juegos de acción y de puzles. El juego es tan simple como original. Por un lado el objetivo del juego es alcanzar la próxima fase sin morir. Por otro lado, las mecánicas de juego son muy originales porque para alcanzar la próxima fase la protagonista dispone de una herramienta que le permite abrir portales. Esta herramienta además te permite usar la fuerza de la gravedad en tu beneficio para alcanzar lugares más altos.

La historia está muy bien escrita y los personajes muy logrados. Amarás cada uno de los robots que pueblan las instalaciones de Aperture (a parte del companion cube). La duración de la aventura en solitario es bastante extensa pero si además le añades la campaña cooperativa y los niveles creados por la comunidad a través de Steam Workshop, entonces obtienes un juego casi infinito. Los chicos de Valve han hecho un gran trabajo. ¡Seguid así!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is one of my favorite games by far. The guys of Valve have managed to mix 2 game genres as different as action and puzzle games in the same game. The game is as simple as original. On the one hand, the main goal of the game is reaching the next stage avoiding death. On the other hand, the game mechanics are really original because in order to reach the next stage the protagonist is provided with a tool which is able to open portals. This tool allows you to use the gravity at your disposal and reach higher places. 

The plot of the game is finely written and the characters are very well created. You will love every one of the robots that inhabit the Aperture installations (apart of the companion cube). The length of the campaign for one player is quite wide but if you add the cooperative campaign and the levels created by the community through Steam Workshop, then you get a game almost endless. The guys from Valve have made a great work. Keep it on!

Sin duda uno de los mejores juego que he jugado, lleva inscripto VALVE, sin duda que lo es. Te metes en la historia y no paras, juegas todo lo que puedes porque te llama la atención qué sigue. Cómo terminará.
No sabía de su existencia, lo compre por la buena puntuación que tenía y estoy totalmente satisfecho, pero por otro lado, en 7 horas me pase todo el juego. No se si sere muy bueno e inteligente o es que se me hizo corto.

Müthiş bir senaryo, müzik ve seslendirmeye sahip kaliteli bir puzzle oyunu oynamak isteyenlere. 2 kişiye kadar destek veren coop bölümleri ise senaryo bölümleri kadar özenle hazırlanmış zekice puzzle'larla dolu. Bir de Half-Life serisinin hikayesiyle ilgileniyorsanız kaçırmamanız gereken bir yapım.
Great game.

What started out as a by-the-side project and expriment has evolved into a grand universe all on its own, with its own stunning story and intriguing background. The world, contained in the test chambers built by a very scientific AI, has the depth and immersion that most other games simply cannot compete with. The puzzles bend your mind, the mechanics are easy, and everything flows together as the player patters their way deep into the heart of the game. Whoever thought small ideas don't get you anywhere, clearly has never had as great a small idea as this one.

Portal 2 takes everything that was great about Portal and extends it into a cinematic expereince unrivalled by any other game I've ever had the pleasure to play. I don't know if there's a better puzzle-based pseudo-shooter, but I would find it hard to believe. The writing is incredible, and the mood-setting of Aperture Science is beyond compare. Music, story, gameplay, atmosphere... what more can you ask from a game?

Juste le meilleur jeu auquel j'ai joué depuis des années. Absolument tout dans ce jeu est bien fait, on reconnait bien là la patte de Valve. 
Un humour décallé qui sied à la perfection. 
Une courbe de difficulté bien calculée avec des éléments de gameplay rajoutés petit à petit. 
Un mode coopératif pour s'amuser entre amis. 
Et un workshop qui redonne une rejouabilitée infinie au jeu (seul ou à 2)

Clairement un must have. Je le recommande à tout le monde.

Portal 2 is still just one of the most fun games you can play.  What's also really nice about it is that you don't need a good system to play and enjoy it for all its worth.  If you get the chance, pick it up.

[u]I really love this game it tests the mind and it's fun at the same time. It has a story and puzzles.[/u] 

[h1]Singleplayer:[/h1] This game is full of twist and turns, puzzles, adventure, science, friends and bad guys. But who is good and who is bad? Is GLaDOS dead or will she have a little juice left? You'll have to buy the game to find out.

[h1]Co-op:[/h1] You can play with your friends as many times as you like. The puzzles get harder and harder and there are Turrets to top it all off. Do you think you can beat the game? Both you and your friend have to have portal in order to do co-op. But if you want to do co-op with out buying two copies and just one copy and use split screen. Have fun! #WhoLikesPortal make it a trend <3
